name: Endless Runner Project
description:
Title: Endless Runner Game

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

This is a simple 2D endless runner game for anyone who wants to pass the time doing something or whoever wants a more challenging version of the dinosaur game.

Instructions:

Press the Up button to start. When there is a Game over, press the Enter button to restart the game.

Game Design Team:

Josue Martinez - Game Designer
